imgAlt.title: ⚠️ A11y: Missing alt attribute
imgAlt.description: Images must include an alt attribute to provide text alternatives for screen readers.

missing.title: ⚠️ A11y: Missing <main> tag
missing.description: A <main> tag is important for accessibility to identify the main content of the page.
missing.action: Use <main> to mark the main content of the page.

tooMany.title: ⚠️ A11y: Too many <main> tags
tooMany.description: There can only be one visible <main> tag per page to prevent screen readers from being confused.

multipleH1.title: ⚠️ A11y: Too many <h1> tags
multipleH1.description: There should only be one <h1> heading per page describing the main content.

skippedLevel.title: ⚠️ A11y: Heading level skipped
skippedLevel.description: Hierarchy is inconsistent (e.g. <h1> to <h3>). Headings should not be used for styling only.

normal.title: ⚠️ A11y: Low Contrast (Text)
normal.description: Contrast is {ratio}:1. Required is 4.5:1 for normal text (WCAG AA).

largeText.title: ⚠️ A11y: Low Contrast (Large)
largeText.description: Contrast is {ratio}:1. Required is 3:1 for large text (WCAG AA).

ui.title: ⚠️ A11y: Low Contrast (UI)
ui.description: Contrast is {ratio}:1. Required is 3:1 for UI elements (WCAG AA).

colorAlone.title: ⚠️ A11y: Color alone used
colorAlone.description: Links must not rely on color alone. Add 'text-decoration: underline' or remove 'none'.

codeLens.title: ⚠️ A11y: Color/Contrast Issue
codeLens.description: Check the problems panel for details.

missingDescribedBy.title: ℹ️ A11y: Link additional information
missingDescribedBy.description: For required fields, 'aria-describedby' is recommended to link hints or error messages. Use native HTML primarily, but ARIA for this connection.

missing.title: ⚠️ A11y: Language not defined
missing.description: The <html> element needs a 'lang' attribute (e.g., lang="en") so screen readers can choose the correct pronunciation.
